message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe will be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering my budget and the product's value to me.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. To be fair to the product's potential, I could come down to $1,050,000.  I'm confident this price reflects a win-win for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $950,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
